text: Bawcomville is an unincorporated community and census-designated place in Ouachita Parish, Louisiana, United States. Its population was 3,588 as of the 2010 census. ==Geography== According to the U.S. Census Bureau, the community has an area of ; of its area is land, and is water. Prior to 2010, the Census Bureau included both Bawcomville and Brownsville in the Brownsville- Bawcomville census-designated place for statistical purposes. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Ouachita Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana Category:Census-designated places in Ouachita Parish, Louisiana Category:Census-designated places in Louisiana
title: Bawcomville, Louisiana
